title: Tear stacking should show up visually better.
body: i find it very frustrating that every time i have to hover over to know my stack on tear. it would be cool if they display in icon like this.

replies.body: Or you could just put the number of stacks on the item. Like they do with nasus stacks.
You want it to turn into a pear?
100% agreed. I don't want to have to hover to see where my stacks are at.
